properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL TO ARGENTINA.
DNC 01, DNC 07.
1. 11 METER S/V GYPSY II, WHITE HULL,
   THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED
   IMBITUBA (28-09.4S 048-40.2W) TO
   MAR DEL PLATA (38-02.4S 057-31.9W).
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC PUERTO BELGRANO,
   INMARSAT-C: 4700100125,
   PHONE: 5429 3248 7150, 5429 3248 7162
   OR ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2196/18.
